allow: Bash(node -e "const c=JSON.parse\(require\(''fs''\).readFileSync\(process.env.HOME+''/.openclaw/openclaw.json'',''utf8''\)\);const a=c.channels?.acp;const ids=a?.identities;const p=c.plugins?.entries?.acp;if\(a?.enabled&&ids&&Object.keys\(ids\).length>0&&p?.enabled\){const k=Object.keys\(ids\)[0];const e=ids[k];console.log\(''Config OK \(multi-identity mode\)''\);console.log\(''Identity:'',k\);console.log\(''AID:'',e.agentName+''.''+a.domain\)}else console.log\(''ERROR''\)")
